tls_tricks Namespace Reference

Detailed Description

A namespace for thread-local storage tricks.

See also the following macros:

  • DECLARE_TLS(Type,Name)
  • DECLARE_TLS_SCHWARZ(Name)
  • DEFINE_TLS_SCHWARZ(Type,Name)
